MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: coreos: etcd: # generate a new token for each unique cluster from https://discovery.etcd.io/new discovery: https://discovery.etcd.io/<token> # deployments across multiple cloud services will need to use $public_ipv4 addr: $private_ipv4:4001 peer-addr: $private_ipv4:7001 units: - name: etcd.service command: start - name: fleet.service command: start
